iaallowsbackup.description: Used to disable iTunes backups of Mail+ data
iaallowsbackup.title: Allow Backups

iaclientcertificate.description: Used for two-factor certificate authentication. This should also be used as a replacement for AppTunnel for Mail apps
iaclientcertificate.title: Client Cert

iadeviceid.description: Used to manage the deviceid Mail+ uses to connect to the ActiveSync server. Ex: $DEVICE_UUID_NO_DASHES$ or ABC123. Please make sure this is an ActiveSync formatted deviceid
iadeviceid.title: Device ID

iaencryptioncert.description: Separate signing certificate. Use this ONLY if signing and encryption certificate are different. This cannot be used with iasmimecertificate
iaencryptioncert.title: Encryption Cert

iaencryptionrequired.description: Require all outgoing emails to be encrypted
iaencryptionrequired.title: Encryption Required

iahidesnapshot.description: This controls the screenshot saved into the app directory when the app enters the background
iahidesnapshot.title: Hide Snapshot

ialicensekey.description: Mail+ license key given to you by iKonic Apps
ialicensekey.title: Mail+ License Key

iaminpasscodecomplexcharacters.description: Number of required complex characters in the passcode
iaminpasscodecomplexcharacters.title: Minimum Passcode Complex Characters

iaminpasscodelength.description: Used to set passcode difficulty length
iaminpasscodelength.title: Minimum Passcode Length

iapasscoderequired.description: Require or disable an app passcode. This value will take precedence over ActiveSync policies. Note: this does not affect device passcode.
iapasscoderequired.title: Passcode Required

iapasscoderequiredforviewingencrypted.description: Require a passcode to access the encryption certificate. Must be used with iapasscoderequired set to TRUE
iapasscoderequiredforviewingencrypted.title: Passcode Required For Viewing Encryption Cert

iapassword.description: ActiveSync password. Send $NULL$ to force the user to input his/her password instead.
iapassword.title: ActiveSync Password

iaserver.description: The ActiveSync server or proxy. This value must begin with 'http://' or 'https://'.
iaserver.title: ActiveSync Server

iasigningcert.description: Separate signing certificate. Use this ONLY if signing and encryption certificate are different. This cannot be used with iasmimecertificate
iasigningcert.title: Signing Cert

iasigningrequired.description: Require all outgoing emails to be signed
iasigningrequired.title: Signing Required

iasmimecertificate.description: Certificate used for signing and encryption
iasmimecertificate.title: SMIME Cert

iasmimerequireencryptedreplies.description: Used to require encrypted emails also be replied/forwarded as encrypted
iasmimerequireencryptedreplies.title: SMIME Required Encrypted Replies

iasmimeshoulduse3des.description: Used to change the encryption algorithm to 3DES
iasmimeshoulduse3des.title: Should Use 3DES Encryption

iasupportemail.description: The email address users should contact for additional help
iasupportemail.title: Support Email

iasupporturl.description: The support URL users should be directed to if they need help
iasupporturl.title: Support URL
